faqs.title: FAQ_menu_launch
faqs.body:
*About this MomConnect study*

This is a research study to find out how MomConnect can make it quicker and easier for moms to answer questions and get support on WhatsApp.

You can stop these messages or leave the study at any time.

To learn more, ask a question from the list 👇🏽

faqs.title: About_this_study
faqs.body:
*This research study is testing 2 ways of asking questions on WhatsApp.*

We want to see what moms find easier and quicker

1. Using multiple-choice questions with buttons ✅
_or_
2. Chatting to a chatbot that uses artificial intelligence (AI) 💬

*What is AI?*
AI is a technology that can understand questions and give helpful answers, like a real person.

*Who is doing the study?*
It's being run by Reach Digital Health with support from OpenAi. It has the approval of the National Department of Health.

You can ask for more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: How_it_works
faqs.body:
*How the study works*

When you join MomConnect, you may be invited to join this study. All moms who join are randomly put into a group.

• Group 1: Gets the usual multiple-choice questions ✅
• Group 2: Chats with an AI chatbot 💬

You get sent questions up until week 37 of pregnancy or until baby is born. In that time you'll get between 4 and 7 surveys (sets of questions).

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: Why_do_it
faqs.body:
*Why do the study?*

The aim of the study is to learn what can make MomConnect easier and quicker for moms to use.

By taking part, you're helping give women in South Africa better pregnancy support in the future. Every answer teaches us about what works best for moms like you.

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: Study_questions
faqs.body:
*Questions in the study*

You'll get different sets of questions asking about:
• yourself 💕
• a healthy pregnancy 🤰🏾
• how your pregnancy check-ups at the clinic have been 🏥

You may be asked some questions more than once.

The only personal information we collect is the name you give on MomConnect and your telephone number.

You won't get asked for any other personal information.

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: Who_sees_answers
faqs.body:
*Who can see your answers*

A small team at Reach Digital Health will be able to fetch and see your answers, but these answers can't be linked to you or your phone number.

All chats in WhatsApp are secure, and your answers are stored on protected computers 🖥️

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: Study_payment
faqs.body:
*Study payment*

You don't get paid to take part. But you do get *R30 airtime* when you join to say thank you.

Sending and receiving messages on the study number uses data like any other chat in WhatsApp. But we don't use any videos, or big images that use lots of data.

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: About_airtime
faqs.body:
*Getting the R30 airtime*

When you replied `Yes` to the first message on this WhatsApp number, you should automatically have been sent R30 airtime 📱

You only get airtime *once* for taking part in the study.

Please check your SMS history for a message about the R30 airtime. If you didn't get it, tell us and we can check for you.

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: No_airtime_received
faqs.body:
We're sorry you haven't got your airtime yet. Our team will check what went wrong and someone will contact you.

Please keep checking your SMSs for the voucher 💬

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: Stop_messages
faqs.body:
*How to stop messages or leave the study*

You can stop messages from this number or leave the study at any time.

*How to stop messages* 🛑
To stop getting messages from this WhatsApp number, type `Stop messages`. You will still get your MomConnect messages on the 0796312456 number 💕

*How to leave the study* 👋🏽
If you don't want your answers to be part of this research, you can leave the study by typing `Delete my data`. Your answers won't be used and you won't get messages on this number anymore.

faqs.title: Opt_out_reason
faqs.body:
We're sorry to see you leave this study! Please could you tell us *why you're leaving*. Choose one of these answers:

• I don't feel like it anymore 👎🏽
• It uses too much data 🌐
• I don't have time 🕘
• I get too many messages 📳
• There are too many questions❓
• Something else 💬
• I don't want to leave - stay on the study 👍🏽

faqs.title: Opt_out_reason_other
faqs.body: Please tell us why you're leaving. Type and send in your answer.

faqs.title: Opt_out_thanks
faqs.body:
Thanks for telling us. We won't send any more messages from this number. You will still get your messages from MomConnect (0796312456).

Wishing you a happy, health pregnancy! 💕

faqs.title: Rejoin
faqs.body:
Thank you for staying with us. You're helping moms all over South Africa by taking part 💕

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: Complaints
faqs.body:
*How to make a complaint*

To make a complaint about this study, please send a message to the MomConnect helpdesk.

To do this:

1. Go to the MomConnect WhatsApp line (0796312456) and send in the word ASK

2. Then type your complaint and send it

Or you can email your complaint to momconnect@reachdigitalhealth.org

Tap to see more information about the study 👇🏽

faqs.title: FAQ_menu_general
faqs.body:
*About this MomConnect study*

This is a research study to find out how MomConnect can make it quicker and easier for moms to answer questions and get support on WhatsApp.

To learn more about it, ask a question from the list 👇🏽
